fields.description: HDFS-10256 changed this to rely on the generic path, however Windows generates a full address which does not work.

comments.body:
I have the feeling that most unit tests on Windows are failing because of this.
It would make sense to try to fix {{GenericTestUtils#getRandomizedTempPath()}} and {{GenericTestUtils#getTempPath()}} instead of adding a name for all tests.

[~vinayrpet], [~ajisakaa], I'd like to get your feedback as you guys were involved in HDFS-10256.
The main issue is that now we are using full windows paths for HDFS addresses.

bq. It would make sense to try to fix GenericTestUtils#getRandomizedTempPath() and GenericTestUtils#getTempPath() instead of adding a name for all tests.
+1

GenericTestUtils was already fixed as part of HDFS-13296.
 [^HDFS-13268.001.patch] looks good and it doesn't seem to break any unit test in Linux.
+1
I have also hit this issue before in some other tests. +1 non-binding.

Thanks [~surmountian] for the patch and [~botong] for the review.
Committed to trunk, branch-3.1, branch-3.0, branch-2, and branch-2.9.
